Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    This GUI-Class is for the settings in the menu of the GUI-Class View.
    Version:
    03-14-2013
    Author:
    AHMED ALY, Alexander Rieppel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Settings(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display)
      Main Constructor initialize the Shell and set the Location and the size.

    • Method Detail

      • initGUI

        public void initGUI()
        This function is for the menuitem change name. It's create a GUI with a textfield to type in the name and a button save to save the new name.

      • initGuiVersion

        public void initGuiVersion()
        This function is for the menuitem abort. It's create a GUI with a labels with the programm information.

      • fehler

        public void fehler()
        This function is for the view gui if you try to type a message without set a name. It's create a GUI with a label with the write message.

      • open

        public void open()
        This function is for opening the swt gui and for makeing sure it does not close after open it emedeatly. This function let the gui open until you close it. This function is nessesary because swt is a thred.
